definition: and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: The hardware part is simple enough and uses COM and LPT port of the computer.
sentences.chinese: 硬件部分很簡單，並使用COM和並口端口的電腦。

sentences.english: We got rid of serial and parallel ports.
sentences.chinese: 我們拋棄了串口和並口。

sentences.english: The implementation of virtual parallel port is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了虛擬並口的實現方法。

sentences.english: Finally, the characteristics of virtual parallel port is summarized.
sentences.chinese: 對虛擬並口的特點進行了總結。

sentences.english: Communication module designed through LPTs is applicative to both desktop and notebook computer.
sentences.chinese: 設計的並口通訊模塊適用於臺式和筆記本微機。

sentences.english: Connect to another computer using your serial, parallel, or infrared port.
sentences.chinese: 使用串口，並口或紅外端口連接到其它計算機。

sentences.english: Configuring devices attached to a parallel port can be more complex.
sentences.chinese: 配置對一個並口的裝置附件可能是更復雜的。

sentences.english: Similar steps are required for other parallel port devices.
sentences.chinese: 相似的步爲其他的並口裝置被需要。
